main event: Two Air Force police officers and a Civilian security guard observed a round, white, luminous object near Wichita Falls, Texas, on August 26, 1956, for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being 40-50 feet in diameter and emitted a pulsating light., The sighting involved multiple witnesses, including Air Force personnel and a civilian., The object hovered before departing at a high rate of speed., The object was confirmed by physical evidence present at the scene., The report confirmed that there are no photographs available.
witness description: Two Air Force police officers and a Civilian security guard on duty at Sheppard AFB
